00014         DbColumn& DbData::getColumn(const std::string& name) {
00015                 DB_DATA::iterator column_it = DB_DATA::find(name);
00016                 if( column_it == DB_DATA::end()) {
00017                         std::string columnList;
00018                         for(DB_DATA::const_iterator it = DB_DATA::begin(); it != DB_DATA::end(); it++) {
00019                                 columnList += "[" + it->first + "]";
00020                         }
00021                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, 
00022                                                                          "DataResult does no contains column with name '" << name << "'. There is " << columnCount() << " columns: " << columnList);
00023                 }
00024                 return column_it->second;
00025         }

00031         std::string DbData::getColumnName(uint32_t columnNo) { 
00032                 if(columnNo > columnCount()) 
00033                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, 
00034                                                                          "Failed to get column's " << columnNo << " name. Out of bounds " << columnCount());
00035                 DB_DATA::const_iterator cit = DB_DATA::begin();
00036                 for(uint32_t cn=0;  cn < columnNo; cn++){
00037                         cit++;
00038                 }
00039                 return cit->first;
00040         }
00041 
00042         const DbColumn& DbData::getColumn(uint32_t columnNo) { 
00043                 if(columnNo > columnCount())
00044                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, "Failed to get column " << columnNo << ". Out of bounds " << columnCount());
00045

00049                         cit++;
00050                 }
00051                 return cit->second;
